articles.description: Amitabh Bachchan-Jaya Bachchan, Shabana Azmi-Javed Akhtar were among film personalities who paid tribute to music maestro Shiv Kumar Sharma. His funeral will be held on Wednesday at the Vile Parle Hindu cremation ground.
articles.content: The santoor maestro Pt Shiv Kumar Sharma passed away on Tuesday due to age-related issues. He was 83. He is survived by wife Manorama Sharma and sons Rahul and Rohit Sharma. On Wednesday, the musicia… [+2226 chars]
